Na mommɔ mo nyame din, na me nso memmɔ AWURADE din, na onyame a ɔde ogya bɛgye soɔ no, ɔno ne Onyankopɔn. Na ɔman no nyinaa gyee so sɛ: Ɔsɛmpa!
Ɛnna Elia ka kyerɛɛ Baal adiyifoɔ no sɛ: Monyi nantwinini baako mfa, na monsiesie no kane; na mo deɛ, modɔɔso; na mommɔ mo nyame din, na ogya na mommfa nngu aseɛ.

Na wɔfaa nantwinini a wɔde maa wɔn no, na wɔsiesiee; na wɔbɔɔ Baal din firii anɔpa kɔsii awigyina sɛ: Baal, gye yɛn so! Nso wɔante nne biara, na obiara nso annye so. Na wɔhurihuri twaa afɔrebukyia a wɔyɛeɛ no ho hyiae.

Na ɛduruu awigyina no, Elia sii wɔn atwetweɛ goroo wɔn ho, na ɔkaa sɛ: Momfa nne kɛseɛ mfrɛ na onyame ne no! Sɛsɛɛ ɔredwene, anaasɛ wafiri adi rekɔgya ne nan, anaasɛ ɔnam kwan so; ebia wada, na wanyane.
Na wɔde nne kɛseɛ teateaa mu, na wɔde nkrantɛ ne mpea bobɔɔ wɔn ho akam, sɛdeɛ wɔn amanneɛ teɛ no, kɔsii sɛ mogya guu wɔn soɔ.
Na awigyina twaa mu no, wɔkɔmee kɔsii sɛ ɛrekɔ aduane afɔrebɔ berɛ soɔ; nso wɔante nne biara, na obiara nso annye so, na obiara nso antie wɔn.
Ɛnna Elia ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no nyinaa sɛ: Montwe mpini me! Na ɔman no nyinaa twe pinii no. Na ɔsiesiee AWURADE afɔrebukyia a abubuo no.
Na Elia tasee aboɔ dummienu sɛ Yakob a AWURADE asɛm baa ne nkyɛn sɛ: Israel ne wo din no, mma mmusuakuo no ano sie.
Na ɔde aboɔ no sii afɔrebukyia, AWURADE din mu, na ɔtwaa ɛka a ɛbɛdi aba a wɔguo susuo adeɛ mmienu afɔrebukyia no ho hyiae.
Na ɔhyehyɛɛ nnyina no, na ɔtwitwaa nantwinini no asinasini de guu nnyina no so kaa sɛ: Momfa nsuo nhyehyɛ nhina nnan amaama, na mommɛhwie ngu ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne nnyina no so!
Na ɔkaa sɛ: Monyɛ bio! Na wɔyɛɛ bio. Na ɔkaa sɛ: Momma no nyɛ mprɛnsa! Na wɔmaa no yɛɛ mprɛnsa.
Na nsuo no fefaa afɔrebukyia no ho hyiae, na ɛka no nso, ɔhyɛɛ no nsuo ma.

Na afɔrebɔberɛ mu no, Odiyifoɔ Elia twe pinii, na ɔkaa sɛ: AWURADE, Abraham ne Isak ne Israel Nyankopɔn, nnɛ ma wɔnhunu sɛ wo na wone Onyankopɔn Israel mu, na mene w’akoa, na w’asɛm so na mayɛ adeɛ yi nyinaa.
Gye me so, AWURADE, gye me so, na ɔman yi nhunu sɛ wo AWURADE ne Onyankopɔn, na wo nso woama wɔn akoma asane akyire aba.
Ɛnna AWURADE gya duru bɛhyee ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ no ne nnyina no ne aboɔ ne dɔteɛ no, na ɛwee nsuo a ɛwɔ ɛka no mu no.
Na ɔman no nyinaa hunuiɛ no, wɔde wɔn anim butubutuu fam kaa sɛ: AWURADE, ɔno ne Onyankopɔn! AWURADE, ɔno ne Onyankopɔn!
Na Elia kaa sɛ: Monkyere Baal adiyifoɔ no, mommma wɔn mu biara mmfiri mu mfi! Na wɔkyeree wɔn na Elia de wɔn siane kɔɔ Kison asuo ho, na ɔkumm wɔn wɔ hɔ.
Na Elia ka kyerɛɛ Ahab sɛ: Foro kɔ kɔdidi na nom. Na mete osu kɛseɛ nka.
Na Ahab foro kɔɔ sɛ ɔrekɔdidi na wanom. Na Elia deɛ, ɔforo kɔɔ Karmel atifi na ɔkotoo fam, na ɔde n’anim hyɛɛ ne nkotodwe ntam.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ n’abɔfra sɛ: Foro kɔ kɔhwɛ po fam. Na ɔforo kɔhwɛe, na ɔbɛkaa sɛ: Hwee nni hɔ. Na ɔse: Sane kɔ mprɛnson.
Na ɛbaa sɛ, deɛ ɛtɔ so nson no, ɔkaa sɛ: Hwɛ, mununkum ketewa bi te sɛ onipa nsa resɔre firi po mu. Na ɔse: Foro kɔka kyerɛ Ahab sɛ: Siesie wo nteaseɛnam na siane kɔ na osuo ansi wo kwan.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɛyɛɛ kakra na mununkum ne mframa abiri soro tumm, na osu kɛseɛ bi tɔe. Na Ahab nam teaseɛnam mu kɔɔ Yesreel.
Na AWURADE nsa baa Elia so, na ɔbɔɔ n’abɔsoɔ tuu mmirika dii Ahab anim de kɔduruu sɛ wɔrehyɛne Yesreel.
Na Ahab bɛka kyerɛɛ Isebel deɛ Elia yɛeɛ no nyinaa ne sɛdeɛ ɔkumm adiyifoɔ no nyinaa, nkrantɛ ano no.
Na Isebel somaa ɔbɔfoɔ maa no kɔɔ Elia nkyɛn sɛ: Sei na anyame no nyɛ me, na sei nso na wɔmfa nka ho, sɛ ɔkyena sɛsɛɛ na mama wo kra ayɛ sɛ wɔn mu baako deɛ.
Na ɔhunuu saa no, ne nkwa nti ɔsuroe na ɔsɔre kɔe, na ɔkɔduruu Beer-seba a ɛyɛ Yuda deɛ no, na ɔgyaa n’abɔfra no wɔ hɔ.
Na ɔno deɛ, ɔnantee ɛserɛ so da koro kwan na ɔkɔtenaa sesea bi ase, na ɔsrɛ maa ne ho sɛ anka ɔnwu. Na ɔkaa sɛ: Ayɛ yie, afei, AWURADE, fa me kra, na menyɛ nsene m’agyanom.
Na ɔde ne ho too hɔ sesea bi ase. Na hwɛ, ɔbɔfoɔ bɛkaa no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sɔre didi!
Na ɔhwɛe, na hwɛ, na ɔfam a wɔato no nnyansramma soɔ ne nsuo kuruwa si n’atifi; na ɔdidii na ɔnomee, na ɔtɔɔ hɔ dae.
Na AWURADE bɔfoɔ sane bɛkaa no ne mprenu soɔ sɛ: Sɔre didi, na ɔkwan no ware papa ma wo.
Na ɔsɔre didii na ɔnomee, na ɔnantee aduane no ahoɔden mu adaduanan, awia ne anadwo de kɔduruu Nyankopɔn bepɔ Horeb ho.
Na ɔduruu ɔbodan no ho hɔ, na ɔsoɛɛ hɔ. Na hwɛ, AWURADE asɛm baa ne nkyɛn sɛ: Elia, ɛdeɛn na wowɔ yɛ wɔ ha?

Na ɔse: Ninkunu na matwe mama AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, sɛ Israelfoɔ agya w’apam; w’afɔrebukyia no, wɔadwiridwiri, na w’adiyifoɔ nso, wɔde nkrantɛ akum wɔn; na me nko na maka, na wɔrehwehwɛ me aku me.

Na ɔkaa sɛ: Firi adi kɔgyina bepɔ no so AWURADE anim. Na hwɛ, AWURADE twaa mu, na mframa kɛseɛ a ɛyɛ den paepaee mmepɔ na ɛbubuu abotan dii AWURADE anim; nanso na ɛnyɛ mframa no mu na AWURADE wɔ; na mframa no akyiri no asasewosoɔ, na ɛnyɛ asasewosoɔ no mu na AWURADE wɔ;
na asasewosoɔ no akyiri no, ogya, na ɛnyɛ ogya no mu na AWURADE wɔ; na ogya no akyi no ɛnne bɔkɔɔ bi a.
Na ɛbaa sɛ Elia teeɛ no, ɔde ne ngusoɔ kataa n’anim, na ɔfiri kɔgyinaa ɔbodan no ano. Na hwɛ, ɛnne bi baa ne nkyɛn sɛ: Elia, ɛdeɛn na wowɔ yɛ wɔ ha?

Na ɔse: Ninkunu na matwe mama AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, sɛ Israelfoɔ agya w’apam: W’afɔrebukyia no, wɔadwiridwiri, na w’adiyifoɔ nso, wɔde nkrantɛ akum wɔn; na me nko na maka, na wɔrehwehwɛ me aku me.
Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kɔ, sane si wo kwan so kɔ Damasko serɛ so; na sɛ woduru a, sra Hasael ngo si no Siria so hene;
na Nimsi ba Yehu nso, sra no ngo si Israel so hene; na Safat ba Elisa a ɔfiri Abel-mehola no deɛ, sra no si w’ananmu sɛ odiyifoɔ.
Na deɛ ɔbɛfiri Hasael nkrantɛ ano no, Yehu bɛku no, na deɛ ɔbɛfiri Yehu nkrantɛ ano no, Elisa bɛku no.
Nanso mɛgya Israel mu nnipa mpemnson, nkotodwe a ɛnnya nkutoo Baal, ne ano a ɛnnya mfee n’ano.

Ɛnna ɔfirii hɔ kɔeɛ. Na ɔkɔhunuu Safat ba Elisa sɛ ɔrefuntum; anantwie mpamho dummienu na ɛdi n’anim, na ɔno ne deɛ ɛtɔ so dummienu no na ɛrefuntum, na Elia sene baa ne nkyɛn, na ɔtoo ne ngusoɔ guu ne so.
Na ɔgyaa anantwie no hɔ, na ɔtuu mmirika dii Elia akyi kaa sɛ: Ma menkɔ kra m’agya ne me na, na memmɛdi w’akyi. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kɔ na bra, na ɛdeɛn na mayɛ woɔ yi?
Na ɔsane firii n’akyi kɔfaa anantwie mpamho no kumm wɔn, na ɔde anantwie no adwumayɛ nnua no noaa nam no, na ɔde maa nkurɔfoɔ no, na wɔdii; na ɔsɔre kɔdii Elia akyi, na ɔsom no.
Na Siriahene Ben-hadad boaboaa ne dɔm nyinaa ano, na ahemfo aduasa mmienu kaa ne ho, ne apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam, na ɔforo ba bɛtuaa Samaria ne no koeɛ.
Na ɔsomaa abɔfoɔ maa wɔbaa Israelhene Ahab nkyɛn kuro no mu bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Sɛ Ben-hadad seɛ nie:
Wo dwetɛ ne wo sika yɛ me dea, na wo yerenom ne wo mma a wɔn ho yɛ fɛ no nso, wɔyɛ me dea.
Na Israel hene buaa sɛ: W’asɛm no wom, me wura ɔhene, wo na me ne deɛ mewɔ nyinaa wɔ woɔ.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ no sane baa bio bɛkaa sɛ: Sɛ Ben-hadad seɛ nie: Sɛ mesoma maa wɔbaa wo nkyɛn sɛ: Wo dwetɛ ne wo sika ne wo yerenom ne wo mma, fa ma me no,
sɛ ɔkyena sɛsɛberɛ nso mesoma me nkoa ma wɔaba wo nkyɛn abɛkyini wo fie ne wo nkoa afie mu, na adeɛ biara a ɛyɛ wɔn ani so fɛ no, wɔbɛfa akura wɔn nsam de akɔ.
Ɛnna Israel hene frɛɛ asase no so mpanimfoɔ nyinaa sɛ: Monhwɛ nhunu sɛ bɔne na oyi rehwehwɛ; na wasoma ama wɔaba me nkyɛn, me yerenom ne me mma ne me dwetɛ ne me sika ho, na mankame no.
Na mpanimfoɔ no nyinaa ne ɔman no nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ntie, na mpene nso.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Ben-hadad abɔfoɔ no sɛ: Monkɔka nkyerɛ me wura ɔhene sɛ: Deɛ wobisaa w’akoa kane no nyinaa deɛ, mɛyɛ, na asɛm yi deɛ, merentumi menyɛ. Na abɔfoɔ no kɔ kɔka kyerɛɛ no.
Na Ben-hadad soma kɔsee no sɛ: Mede mmarima bebree bɛba abɛsɛe wo kuro no, na wɔasoa hɔ mfuturo wɔn nsamu akɔ. Anyame no nkum me sɛ manyɛ a.
Na Israel hene buaa sɛ: Monkɔka sɛ: Mma deɛ ɔhyɛ akodeɛ nnhoahoa ne ho sɛ deɛ ɔyie.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔtee asɛm yi no, na ɔne ahemfo no renom nsa asese mu, ɔka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ: Montoa kuro no! Na wɔto hyɛɛ kuro no so.
Na hwɛ, odiyifoɔ bi twe pinii Israelhene Ahab sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Wohunu asafokuo kɛseɛ yi nyinaa? Hwɛ, mede wɔn merehyɛ wo nsa nnɛ, na woahunu sɛ mene AWURADE.
Na Ahab kaa sɛ: Ɛnam hwan so? Na ɔse: Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Ɛnam amansini no mmapɔmma mmeranteɛ no so. Ɛnna ɔkaa sɛ: Hwan na ɔmfa nkɔbɔ ani? Na ɔse: Wo!
Ɛnna ɔkan amansini mmapɔmma no mmeranteɛ no, na wɔyɛ ahanu aduasa mmienu, na wɔn akyiri no, ɔkan ɔman no nyinaa, Israel mma nyinaa, mpemnson.
Na wɔfirii adi awigyina. Na Ben-hadad anom nsa abo wɔ asese no mu, ɔno ne ahemfo aduasa mmienu a wɔboa no no.
Na amansini mmapɔmma no mmeranteɛ no firii adi kane. Na Ben-hadad somaa adɔntenfoɔ, na wɔkɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Mmarima afiri adi afiri Samaria reba.
Na ɔse: Sɛ ɔmannwoeɛ so na wɔfirii adie a, monkye wɔn animono, na sɛ ɔko so nso na wɔfirii adie a, monkye wɔn animono.
Na wɔn deɛ, wɔfiri kuro no mu firii adi, amansini mmapɔmma no mmeranteɛ no ne dɔm a wɔdii wɔn akyire no.
Na wɔkumm wɔn mmaako mmaako, na Siriafoɔ dwanedwanee, na Israel tii wɔn, na Siriahene Ben-hadad tenaa ɔpɔnkɔ so ne apɔnkɔsotefoɔ firi dwanee.
Na Israel hene firii adi kɔ kyekyeree apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam, na ɔde okunkɛseɛ kumm Siriafoɔ.
Na odiyifoɔ no twe pinii Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kɔ na kɔhyɛ wo ho den, na hwɛ na hunu deɛ wobɛyɛ; na afeda sɛsɛɛ no Siriafoɔ bɛforo aba wo so.
Na Siriahene nkoa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wɔn nyame yɛ mmepɔ nyame, enti na wɔn ho yɛɛ den sene yɛn no; na sɛ yɛne wɔn koo asaseta so deɛ a, anka yɛn ho renyɛ den nsene wɔn anaa?
Na yei na yɛ: Tutu ahemfo no firi wɔn dibea, na fa amradofoɔ sisi wɔn ananmu.
Na wo deɛ, boaboa ɛdɔm bi ano sɛ ɛdɔm a woahwereɛ no, apɔnkɔ sɛ apɔnkɔ no, ne nteaseɛnam sɛ nteaseɛnam no, na yɛne wɔn nkɔko asaseta so, sɛ yɛn ho renyɛ den nsene wɔn anaa? Na ɔtiee wɔn, na ɔyɛɛ saa.
Na afeda ɔpɛ berɛ mfitiaseɛ no mu, Ben-hadad boaboaa Siriafoɔ dɔm ano na ɔforo baa Afek sɛ ɔne Israel rebɛko.
Na wɔboaboaa Israelfoɔ nso ano, na wɔsiesiee wɔn ho, na wɔkɔ kɔhyiaa wɔn. Na Israelfoɔ kyeree nsraban wɔn ntentensoɔ sɛ mmirekyie akuo nketewa mmienu. Na Siriafoɔ deɛ, wɔyɛɛ asase no ma.

Na Nyankopɔn nipa no twe pinii bɛka kyerɛɛ Israel hene sɛ: Sɛdeɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Ɛsiane sɛ Siriafoɔ aka sɛ: Mmepɔ nyame ne AWURADE, na ɔnyɛ mmonhwa mu nyame nti, mede wɔn asafokuo kɛseɛ yi nyinaa bɛhyɛ wo nsa, na moahunu sɛ mene AWURADE.
Na wɔkyeree nsraban, yeinom wɔ yeinom ntentensoɔ, nnanson. Na da a ɛtɔ so nson no, wɔde dɔm koo no kɔbɔɔ anim na Israelfoɔ no kumm Siriafoɔ anammɔnmufoɔ mpemha da koro.
Na nkaeɛ no dwanedwane kɔɔ Afek kuro no mu, na ɔfasuo no bu guu nnipa a wɔkaeɛ no mu mpem aduonu nson so.
Na Ben-hadad deɛ, ɔdwane kɔɔ kuro no mu firi pia mu kɔɔ pia mu.

Na ne nkoa ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ, yɛate sɛ Israel fie ahemfo yɛ ahemfo a wɔyɛ adɔeɛ. Ma yɛmfa ayitoma nkyekyere yɛn asene, na yɛmfa ntampehoma mmobɔ yɛn ti, na yɛmfiri nkɔ Israel hene nkyɛn; ebia ɔbɛgye wo kra nkwa.
Na wɔde ayitoma kyekyeree wɔn asene, na wɔde ntampehoma bobɔɔ wɔn ti, na wɔbaa Israel hene nkyɛn sɛ: W’akoa Ben-hadad se: Ma me kra nnya nkwa ɛ! Na ɔbisaa sɛ: Ɔda so te ase? Ɔyɛ me nua.

Afei na mmarima no rehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ anim kwan, na wɔyɛɛ ntɛm gyee asɛm no, na wɔkaa sɛ: Wo nua ne Ben-hadad. Na ɔse: Monkɔfa no mmra! Na Ben-hadad firi baa ne nkyɛn; na ɔmaa no foro baa teaseɛnam no mu.

Na Ben-hadad ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Nkuro a m’agya gyee no w’agya nsam no, mɛdane mama, na te mmorɔno nso Damasko fa, sɛdeɛ m’agya tee no Samaria no. Na Ahab kaa sɛ: Me nso, mede apam bɛgya wo kwan. Ɛnna ɔne no pameeɛ, na ɔgyaa no kwan.
Ɛnna ɔbarima bi a ɔfiri adiyifoɔ mma mu de AWURADE asɛm ka kyerɛɛ ne yɔnko sɛ: Bɔ me ɛ! Na ɔbarima no ampene sɛ ɔbɔ no.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɛsiane sɛ woantie AWURADE nti, hwɛ, wofiri me nkyɛn ha rekɔ ara pɛ a, gyata bɛku wo. Na ɔfiri ne kyɛn kɔeɛ no, gyata hunuu no, na ɔkum no.
Na ɔhunuu ɔbarima foforɔ, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Bɔ me ɛ! Na ɔbarima no bɔɔ no, ɔbɔɔ no piraa no.
Ɛnna odiyifoɔ no kɔ kɔgyinaa ɔkwan no ho twɛn ɔhene, na ɔde abotire akyekyere n’ani akyiri asakyera ne ho.

Na ɔhene retwam no, ɔbɔnee ɔhene no sɛ: W’akoa firi kɔɔ ɛko no mu, na hwɛ, ɔbarima bi manee de ɔbarima bi brɛɛ me sɛ: Hwɛ ɔbarima yi so, na sɛ ɔyera a, ɛnneɛ wode wo kra bɛsi ne kra ananmu, anaasɛ wobɛtua dwetɛ talente baako.
Na w’akoa reyɛ adeɛ foforɔ no, hwɛ, ɔdwanneeɛ hɔ. Ɛnna Israel hene kaa sɛ: Sɛ w’atemmuo teɛ ne no, wo ara woabu.
Ɛnna ɔyɛɛ ntɛm yii abotire no firii n’ani akyire, na Israel hene no hunuu no sɛ ɔfiri adiyifoɔ no mu.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ɔhene sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Ɛsiane sɛ woama onipa a mahyira no soɔ afiri wo nsa korɔ nti, wo kra bɛsi ne kra ananmu, na wo man asi ne man ananmu.
Ɛnna Israel hene no sii mu kɔɔ ne fie, a wakum n’anim na ne bo afuo, na ɔbaa Samaria.
Na Yesreelni Nabot wɔ bobe turo bi Yesreel wɔ Samariahene Ahab ahemfie ho.
Na Ahab ka kyerɛɛ Nabot sɛ: Fa wo bobe turo no ma me, na memfa menyɛ fan turo, ɛfiri sɛ ɛbɛn me fie ho, na mɛma wo bobe turo a ɛyɛ sene no ahyɛ ananmu, anaasɛ wopɛ a, mɛma wo ɛho sika.
Na Nabot ka kyerɛɛ Ahab sɛ: AWURADE mma yei mpare me, sɛ mede m’agyanom awunnyadeɛ bɛma woɔ.
Ɛnna Ahab kɔɔ ne fie a wakum n’anim na waboto, Yesreelni Nabot asɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ no no nti; sɛ waka akyerɛ no sɛ: Meremfa m’agyanom awunnyadeɛ memma wo. Na ɔdaa ne mpa so danee n’ani, na wannidi.
Na ne yere Isebel baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ: Adɛn na wo honhom aboto sɛɛ na wonnidie yi?
Na ɔbuaa no sɛ: Ɛfiri sɛ me ne Yesreelni Nabot kasae, na mesee no sɛ: Fa wo bobeturo no ma me gye sika, anaasɛ nso sɛ wopɛ a, mɛma wo bobeturo ahyɛ ananmu. Na ɔse: Meremfa me bobeturo no memma wo.
Ɛnna ne yere Isebel ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɛnyɛ wo na wodi Israel soɔ? Sɔre didi, na ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam, na mede Yesreelni Nabot bobeturo no bɛma wo.
Ɛnna ɔde Ahab din twerɛtwerɛɛ nwoma, na ɔde ne nsɔanodeɛ sosɔɔ ano, na ɔsomasoma maa wɔde nwoma no kɔmaa mpanimfoɔ ne adehyeɛ a wɔwɔ ne kurom a wɔne Nabot te mu no.
Na ɔtwerɛɛ nwoma no mu sɛ: Mompae mma wɔnni mmuada, na momfa Nabot ntena nkurɔfoɔ no ti.
Na momfa mmarima baanu a wɔyɛ mmahuhufoɔ nnyina n’anim, na wɔnni adanseɛ ntia no sɛ: Woadome Onyankopɔn ne ɔhene! Na momfa no mfiri nkɔsi no aboɔ mma no nwu.
Ɛnna ne kuro no mufoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne adehyeɛ a wɔte ne kurom no yɛɛ sɛdeɛ Isebel kraa wɔn no, sɛdeɛ ɔtwerɛɛ nwoma a wɔde kɔmaa wɔn no mu no:
Wɔpaee sɛ wɔnni mmuada, na wɔde Nabot tenaa nkurɔfoɔ no ti.

Na mmarima mmahuhufoɔ baanu ba bɛtenaa n’anim, na mmarima ahuhufoɔ no dii adanseɛ tiaa Nabot ɔman no anim sɛ: Nabot adome Onyankopɔn ne ɔhene. Na wɔyii no firi kɔɔ kuro no akyi kɔsii no aboɔ maa no wui.
Ɛnna wɔsoma maa wɔkɔɔ Isebel nkyɛn sɛ: Wɔasi Nabot aboɔ, na wawu.
Na Isebel tee sɛ wɔasi Nabot aboɔ na wawuo no, Isebel ka kyerɛɛ Ahab sɛ: Sɔre kɔfa Yesreelni Nabot bobeturo a ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔde ma wo gye sika no di so, ɛfiri sɛ Nabot nte ase bio, na wawu.
Na ɛbaa sɛ Ahab tee sɛ Nabot awuo no, Ahab sɔree sɛ ɔresiane akɔ Yesreelni Nabot bobeturo no mu akɔfa adi so.
Ɛnna AWURADE asɛm baa Tisbini Elia nkyɛn sɛ:
Sɔre siane kɔhyia Israelhene Ahab a ɔwɔ Samaria no. Hwɛ, ɔwɔ Nabot bobeturo a wasiane kɔ hɔ sɛ ɔrekɔfa adi soɔ no mu;
na ka kyerɛ no sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Woadi awu, na woafa obi adeɛ adi so? Na ka kyerɛ no sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Faako a akraman taferee Nabot mogya no, ɛhɔ na akraman bɛtafere wo nso wo mogya.
Na Ahab ka kyerɛɛ Elia sɛ: Woahu me, me tamfo? Na ɔse: Mahu wo, ɛfiri sɛ woatɔn wo ho ayɛ deɛ ɛyɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne.
Hwɛ, mede bɔne bɛba wo so; mɛpra wo akɔ na matwa Ahab babarima biara wɔ Israel mu, akoa anaa ɔdehyeɛ atwene.
Na mɛyɛ wo fie sɛ Nebat ba Yeroboam fie ne Ahia ba Baasa fie, huru a woahuru me bo na woama Israel ayɛ bɔne nti.
Na Isebel nso, AWURADE kaa ne ho asɛm sɛ: Akraman bɛwe Isebel nam, Yesreel fasuo ho.
Ahab fie mu nipa a ɔbɛwu kuro mu no, akraman na ɛbɛwe ne nam, na deɛ ɔbɛwu wiram no, ewiem nnomaa na ɛbɛdi ne nam.
(Ampa, obiara nni hɔ a ɔte sɛ Ahab a ɔtɔn ne ho sɛ ɔbɛyɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne, ɛfiri sɛ ne yere Isebel hwanyan no.
Na ɔyɛɛ akyiwadeɛ sɛ, sɛ ɔdii ahoni huhuo no akyire, sɛdeɛ Amorifoɔ a AWURADE tuu wɔn Israelfoɔ anim yɛeɛ no ara.)
Na Ahab tee nsɛm yi no, ɔsunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu, na ɔde ayitoma firaeɛ, na ɔdii abuada, na ɔdaa ayitoma no mu, na n’anim yɛɛ samoo.
Na AWURADE asɛm baa Tisbini Elia nkyɛn sɛ: Woahunu sɛ Ahab abrɛ ne ho ase m’anim?
Ɛsiane sɛ wabrɛ ne ho ase m’anim nti, meremfa bɔne no memma ne berɛ so. Ne ba berɛ so, na mede bɔne no bɛba ne fie soɔ.
Na Siria ne Israel tenaa hɔ mfeɛ mmiɛnsa a ɔko bi nni wɔn ntam.
Na afe a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa mu no Yudahene Yehosafat siane baa Israel hene nkyɛn.
Na Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ ne nkoa sɛ: Monnim sɛ Ramot-gilead wɔ yɛn, na yɛn deɛ yɛte hɔ komm na yɛnnye mfiri Siriahene nsam?
Na ɔbisaa Yehosafat sɛ: Wo ne me bɛkɔ Ramot-gilead sa anaa? Na Yehosafat buaa Israel hene no sɛ: Mete sɛ wo, me man te sɛ wo man, m’apɔnkɔ te sɛ w’apɔnkɔ.
Na Yehosafat ka kyerɛɛ Israel hene sɛ: Bisa AWURADE asɛm nnɛ ɛ!
Ɛnna Israel hene boaboaa adiyifoɔ no ano, wɔbɛyɛ mmarima ahanan, na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ: Menkɔ Ramot-gilead menkɔko anaasɛ mennyae? Na wɔkaa sɛ: Foro kɔ, na AWURADE de bɛhyɛ ɔhene nsa.
Ɛnna Yehosafat bisaa sɛ: AWURADE diyifoɔ biara nni ha bio a yɛbɛbisa ne hɔ adeɛ anaa?

Na Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ Yehosafat sɛ: Ɔbarima baako bi da so wɔ hɔ a anka yɛbɛtumi abisa AWURADE afiri ne nkyɛn, nanso metane no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔnhyɛ me ho nkɔm pa, sɛ bɔne nko, ɛyɛ Imla ba Mikaia. Na Yehosafat se: Mma ɔhene nnka saa.
Ɛnna Israel hene frɛɛ gyaaseni bi, na ɔkaa sɛ: Ma Imla ba Mikaia nnuru ha ntɛm!
Na Israel hene ne Yudahene Yehosafat tete wɔn nhennwa so hyehyɛ wɔn ntadeɛ, Samaria pono ano mpraeɛ so, na adiyifoɔ no nyinaa hyehyɛɛ nkɔm wɔn anim.
Na Kenaana ba Sedekia ayɛ dadeɛ mmɛn na ɔkaa sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE seɛ nie: Yeinom na wode bɛsum Siriafoɔ de kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛwie wɔn sɛeɛ.
Na adiyifoɔ no nyinaa hyehyɛɛ nkɔm saa sɛ: Kɔ Ramot-gilead na kɔdi siadeɛ, na AWURADE de ahyɛ ɔhene nsa.
Na ɔbɔfoɔ a ɔkɔfrɛɛ Mikaia no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ, adiyifoɔ no nyinaa de ano korɔ ka asɛmpa kyerɛ ɔhene, ma wo nsɛm nyɛ sɛ wɔn mu baako deɛ, na ka deɛ ɛyɛ!
Na Mikaia kaa sɛ: Sɛ AWURADE te aseɛ yi, deɛ AWURADE bɛka akyerɛ me no, ɛno na mɛka.
Ɛnna ɔbaa ɔhene nkyɛn. Na ɔhene no bisaa no sɛ: Mikaia, yɛnkɔ Ramot-gilead nkɔko anaasɛ yɛnnyae? Na ɔbuaa no sɛ: Kɔ na kɔdi nim, na AWURADE de ahyɛ ɔhene nsa.
Na ɔhene no bisaa no sɛ: Mprɛ ahe ara na menka wo ntam sɛ, nka me asɛm bi sɛ nokorɛ nko AWURADE din mu?
Na ɔse: Mahunu Israel nyinaa sɛ wɔahwete mmepɔ soɔ sɛ nnwan a wɔnni hwɛfoɔ, na AWURADE se: Yeinom nni wura, ma wɔnsane nkɔ wɔn afie asomdwoeɛ mu.
Na Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ Yehosafat sɛ: Manka mankyerɛ wo sɛ ɔrenhyɛ me ho nkɔm pa biara, na mmom bɔne?
Ɛnna ɔkaa sɛ: Enti tie AWURADE asɛm: Mahunu AWURADE sɛ ɔte n’adwa soɔ, na ɔsoro asafo nyinaa gyinagyina ne ho, ne nifa ne ne benkum.
Na AWURADE kaa sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛdaadaa Ahab na waforo akɔtɔ wɔ Ramot-gilead? Na oyi kaa sɛɛ, na oyi kaa sɛɛ.
Na honhom bi firi bɛgyinaa AWURADE anim kaa sɛ: Me na mɛdaadaa no.
Na AWURADE bisaa no sɛ: Wode deɛn? Na ɔse: Mɛfiri makɔyɛ atorɔ honhom n’adiyifoɔ nyinaa anomu. Na ɔkaa sɛ: Wobɛdaadaa no na wobɛtumi nso; firi kɔ na kɔyɛ saa.
Na afei, hwɛ, AWURADE de honhom torofoɔ ahyɛ w’adiyifoɔ yi nyinaa anomu, na AWURADE aka wo ho bɔne.
Ɛnna Kenaana ba Sedekia twe pini bɛbɔɔ Mikaia sotorɔ kaa sɛ: Ɛhe na AWURADE honhom nam firii me nkyɛn kɔ kasa kyerɛɛ woɔ yi?
Na Mikaia se: Hwɛ, da a wobɛfiri pia mu akɔ pia mu akɔhunta no na wobɛhunu.
Ɛnna Israel hene kaa sɛ: Kyere Mikaia, na fa no kɔ kuro no so hwɛfoɔ Amon ne ɔhene ba Yoas nkyɛn,
na kɔka sɛ: Sɛ ɔhene seɛ nie: Momfa oyi nto nneduadan mu, na momma no ahohiahia aduane nni ne ahohiahia nsuo nnom kɔsi sɛ mɛba no dwoodwoo.
Na Mikaia kaa sɛ: Sɛ wosane ba dwoodwoo a, ɛnneɛ na ɛnyɛ AWURADE na ɔnam me so kasaeɛ. Na ɔse: Mo aman nyinaa, montie!
Na Israel hene ne Yudahene Yehosafat foro kɔɔ Ramot-gilead.
Na Israel hene ka kyerɛɛ Yehosafat sɛ: Mɛsakyera me ho na makɔ ɔko no ano, na wo deɛ, hyɛ wo ntadeɛ. Na Israel hene no sakyeraa ne ho, na ɔkɔɔ ko no ano.
Nso na Siriahene no ahyɛ ne nteaseɛnam a ɔwɔ no so asafohene aduasa mmienu no sɛ: Ma monne akumaa anaa ɔkɛseɛ nnko, gye Israel hene no nko.
Na nteaseɛnam so asafohene no hunuu Yehosafat no, wɔkaa sɛ: Ampa, Israel hene no nie! Na wɔmane ne no kɔkoe. Na Yehosafat teaa mu.
Na nteaseɛnam so asafohene no hunuu sɛ ɛnyɛ Israel hene ne no no, wɔsane firii n’akyi.
Na ɔbarima bi twee ne tadua mu anibiannasoɔ so, na ɔde saa Israel hene no mmɔtoam ne nkataboɔ no ntam. Na ɔka kyerɛɛ ne teaseɛnamkafoɔ no sɛ: Dane wo ho fa me firi ɛdɔm yi mu, na mapira.
Na ɔko no mu yɛɛ den da no. Na wɔkura ɔhene no mu maa no gyinaa teaseɛnam no mu Siriafoɔ no anim ara, na ɔwuu anwummerɛ. Na apirakuro no mu mogya sene guu teaseɛnam no mu.
Na wɔpae faa nsraban no mu owiatɔ berɛ sɛ: Obiara nkɔ ne kurom ne n’asase so.
Na ɔhene no wui, na wɔde no baa Samaria; na wɔsiee ɔhene no Samaria.
Na wɔkɔhohoroo teaseɛnam no mu wɔ Samaria tareɛ mu, na akraman bɛtaferee ne mogya, na mmaa nnwamamfoɔ nso dwaree mu, sɛ AWURADE asɛm a ɔkaeɛ no teɛ no.
Na Ahab ho nsɛm nkaeɛ, ne deɛ ɔyɛeɛ nyinaa ne asonse dan a ɔsiiɛ, ne nkuro a ɔkyekyereeɛ nyinaa, wɔantwerɛ no Israel ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu anaa?
Na Ahab toaa n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na ne ba Ahasia bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Na Israelhene Ahab afe a ɛtɔ so nnan mu na Asa ba Yehosafat bɛdii Yuda so hene.
Yehosafat bɛdii hene no, na wadi mfirinhyia aduasa nnum, na ɔdii hene mfirinhyia aduonu nnum wɔ Yerusalem. Na ne na din de Asuba a ɔyɛ Silhi ba.
Na ɔfaa n’agya Asa kwan nyinaa so, wammane amfiri ho, na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛtene AWURADE ani so; gye sorɔnsorɔmmea no na wɔanyiyie, ɔman no kɔɔ so bɔɔ afɔdeɛ na wɔhyee aduhwam sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ.
Na asomdwoeɛ bɛdaa Yehosafat ne Israel hene ntam.
Na Yehosafat ho nsɛm nkaeɛ ne ne mmaninneɛ a ɔyɛeɛ ne sɛdeɛ ɔdii ako no, wɔantwerɛ no Yuda ahemfo berɛsosɛm nwoma no mu anaa?
Na mmarima nnwamamfoɔ nkaeɛ a wɔgyaa wɔn n’agya Asa nna mu no, ɔhyee wɔn ase firii asase no so.
Na ɔhene bi nni Edom; na ɔhene abadiakyire na na ɔhwɛ akyire sɛ ɔhene;
Yehosafat yɛɛ Tarsis ahyɛn sɛ ɛnkɔ Ofir na ɛnkɔpɛ sika kɔkɔɔ, nanso ankɔ, ɛfiri sɛ ahyɛn no bobɔe wɔ Esion-geber.
Ɛno mu na Ahab ba Ahasia ka kyerɛɛ Yehosafat sɛ: Ma me nkoa ne wo nkoa nkɔ ahyɛn no mu. Na Yehosafat ampene.
Na Yehosafat toaa n’agyanom wɔ asamando, na wɔsiee no kaa n’agyanom ho, n’agya Dawid kuro mu; na ne ba Yehoram bɛdii n’adeɛ.
Ahab ba Ahasia bɛdii Israel so hene Samaria, Yudahene Yehosafat afe a ɛtɔ so dunson mu, na ɔdii Israel so mfeɛ mmienu.
Na ɔyɛɛ deɛ ɛyɛ AWURADE ani so bɔne, na ɔfaa n’agya kwan so, ne ne na kwan so, ne Nebat ba Yeroboam a ɔmaa Israel yɛɛ bɔne no kwan so;
na ɔsomm Baal na ɔsɔree no, na ɔhuruu AWURADE, Israel Nyankopɔn bo, sɛdeɛ n’agya yɛeɛ no ara.
